name: Shooty Bubbles - Merge 3 Balls
description:
This is a simple and amazing bubble shooter game that is very easy to play jet hard to master! Once you start playing it you wont stop! The goal of the game is to match 3 or more color bubbles to save and rescue all the baby animals and continue trough levels as they gets more challenging and difficult as you progress.

How to Play ?

- Place your finger on the screen and drag it to aim and shoot the desired target!


Game Features:

- Many levels to choose from
- Many booster to help you progress trough levels
- Simple and user friendly UI
- Great animation effects
- Unique and smooth gaming experience
- Suitable for kids of all ages


Download it today for FREE and play it alone or with friends to see who can get the highest score! Enjoy!
